headline: How The Marsh & McLennan Companies MMC Story Is Shifting With Mixed Analyst Signals
summary: The latest update to the Marsh & McLennan Companies narrative reflects only a very small trim in fair value, with the model price estimate moving to about US$211.33 per share from roughly US$211.62. The discount rate stays effectively unchanged at around 6.96%, and revenue growth assumptions ease slightly to about 5.33% from roughly 5.35%. This fine tuning aligns with Street commentary that combines confidence in the business with more cautious expectations for growth and places the stock...
